title: Street Photography
content:
No snow here this winter so I've been reduced to taking pictures of ice on street puddles.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730024943im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_4397xx_4387.jpg)
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
That's amazing; thanks for sharing.

Do you have full-resolution photos posted somewhere for us to enjoy?

Thank you, gentlemen. :-) This really doesn't have much post processing done to it. Just caught the light and shadows at the right time, I guess.

I don't have any full-resolution shots online. My photos on my site are about this size. This one would be too big at full-resolution, anyway. I'm going to print it on canvas at 36"x24". I hope it will be a cool abstract.

Thanks again.
